tips: Wash your clothes in cold water
Fill the washing machine / dryer / dishwasher before operation
prefer a fan to the air conditioning, since it consume a lot less
depending on how hot it is, sometimes just opening the windows and generating airflow is enough to cool down your house instead of turning on the air conditioning
try to set air conditioner's thermostat to moderate temperature
use air conditioner locally in the room you're using instead of the whole house. Do you really need to cool or warm up all the rooms?
avoid opening frequently the refrigerator door
leave enough space between the refrigerator and the wall to allow ventilation
use a laundry hanger instead of the electric dryer
